p.s: Getting a new dog can be exciting and a life changing experience .
In fact , you may grow to become best friends with your dog !
Although , getting a new dog can be frustrating and stressful .

item.s: Feeding your dog can be extrememly difficult !
When you have a dog , food matters a lot .
A dog with food is a happy dog !
Add different meat to the food if your dog is picky . ( Make sure the added food is healthy . ) You can get canned dog food at stores that is high in protein and nutrition .
Get the right type of kibble for your dog .
Kibble depends on breed , age , and size .
Lots of people think that dogs do n't to bath that much because they 'll just get dirty again , but bathing your dog is highly important .
Get flea bath shampoo that rids your dog 's fur of ticks and fleas .
Check the ingredients and the prices .
Be gentle when bathing your dog .
If you notice that your dog 's skin is flaking or dry , go to a vet near you .
Your pet 's doctor should give you some advice or special shampoo that will help your dog 's skin .
Let your dog out as often as possible ! Exercise and pottying is important for you dog at all times .
Tell your dog a certain word everytime they use the bathroom .
For instance : " Go potty " or " Drop a duse " .
They will get used to the certain word and potty on command .
Do n't let your dog in until they poop/pee .
Use training pads if peeing/pooping in house continues .
Keep moving it closer to your door and finally outside .
Your dog will start to get use to pottying outside .
If you have to work away from home , always let your dog out as soon as you get home .
Let your dog get 1-4 hours of running outside per day .
We all know that we need our naps .
If we do n't get them , there will be issues !
It 's the same thing for dogs !
Have a certain bed time . ( This may sound weird , but it helps your dog get lots of sleep . )
Use a certain word everytime you go to bed .
For instance : " Time for bed " or " TO BED NOW , YOU HEATHEN ! " . ( Just jokin ' ! ) Your dog will begin to go to his/her bed on command .
Allow them to get used to sleeping on your bed or theirs .
Try not to get to irritated .
The more you yell at your dog , the more your relationship will drift apart .
If your dog gets out of control ( Jumping , clawing , biting , etc. ) , simply tell them to stop .
If nothing happens , ignore them and they will realise they are n't getting your attention .
Finally , walk away or keep your dog on a leash until they learn to stop .
When your dog poops or ruins your brand new purse ( Or anything else ) , keep calm .
Simply show them it and say " No " or " Bad " .
This will take some time , but will be worth it in the end .
If your dog escapes from your yard , remain calm .
Call their name a few times .
Do n't run after them .
This is a threat towards them .
Get a bit low to show that they have dominance ( But they do n't , you 're just tricking them ! ) and slowly approach them .
Say stuff like " Come here , buddy/girl .
Want some treats ?
Say it in a soothing voice .
DO NOT yell .
Make sure you get plenty of quality time with them .
Instead of family bonding , your just bonding with you dog !
Get out as much as possible with your dog .
Lay with them on the couch .
Pet them often .
If you ca n't spend quality time with your dog , do n't even own a dog .
Finally , if you just ca n't handle a dog , get rid of it .
If it 's an attacking dog , put him/her down .
Make sure they are going to a loving home .
Get the new owners at least some starting supplies ( Your dog 's favorite toy , his/her dish , kibble , etc. ) .
Make sure they ( your dog ) understand .
